Hi=C2=A0

Can anyone explain me the internal functioning of Heritrix?

Than=
ks and Regards
Smriti Malhotra

________________________________
 From: Kri=
stinn Sigur=C3=B0sson <kristinn@...>

=C2=A0 
There must be more to the error message than that. There =
will usually be more details in the heritrix_out.log.

Most likely it is no=
t finding the index.

You may also want to begin with the example profile t=
hat is supplied with the deduplicator. It should work, as is, if you just s=
et the "deduplicator.indexLocation" and "metadata.operatorContactUrl" to ap=
propriate values and add some seeds.

- Kris

      <div>There must be mor=
e to the error message than that. There will usually be more details in the=
 heritrix_out.log.<br>
<br>
Most likely it is not finding the index.<br>
<b=
r>
You may also want to begin with the example profile that is supplied wit=
h the deduplicator. It should work, as is, if you just set the "deduplicato=
r.indexLocation" and "metadata.operatorContactUrl" to appropriate values an=
d add some seeds.<br>
<br>
- Kris<br>
